extendedInfo.description: PLEASE READ THE DESCRIPTION! Not compatible with all phones nor Android 4.2+.Play games with a Wii remote on your Android device!Incompatibility update: Android 4.2+ is not compatible with this app. The reason for this is that Google changed an essential bluetooth component in this version of Android. We are looking for a solution.News, changelog and FAQ are on the dev's website. Link is below description.Problems? Please read the FAQ on the dev's website before emailing.This app doesn't work on phones with HTC Sense UI and most newer Samsung phones (Galaxy S included). More info on the website.Website: http://android.ccpcreations.com/wiicontroller

reviews.title: Very useful app
reviews.comment: This app is amazing! I originally thought it was a hoax and wouldn\'t work, but it works great! In the house using aux or car, I can control my playlist! Thank you so much!
reviews.author: Sandy Janes

reviews.title: Excellent apps..working on HTC One X out of box
reviews.comment: Got this on the HTC One X out of box. Working without problem. Turn on WiiController IME. Turn on bluetooth, Run Wiimote Controller apps. Press the red button behind Wiimote, press sync button on the apps. Once it found the controller, change the keyboard to WiiController IME. Run your favourite emulator apps and bind the gamepad key to your Wiimote and enjoy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It\'s extremely easy to use so it\'s user friendly, and it works great.
reviews.author: cesar martinez

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Simple, easy, effective, brilliant... great job!
reviews.author: Sage Albright

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Works great for my xperia arc s but won\'t connect to my nexus 7. I hear several people are having this problem. I\'ll rate 5 stars when fixed.
reviews.author: Luis Indrusiak

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: So simple to use and works flawlessly
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad for free
reviews.comment: It could be better, maybe have a way to download recommended profiles for specific games. I would love to see wii u pro controller support.
reviews.author: Ima Tron

reviews.title: Works on S3 AND T700
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly on my Asus Transformer tablet and Galaxy S3. You need to be slightly smarter than the Wiimote. To all of the mouth-breathers...try mapping the keys. Thank you, dev!
reviews.author: Michael Burns

reviews.title: Truely a fantastic app with one fatal flaw
reviews.comment: It works exactly as advertised. I initially bought a Galaxy Nexus and ROMmed 4.2.2 onto it and it worked great, except for this app. After downgrading to 4.1.2 it works great!  5 starts and a donation if 4.2.x is supported.
reviews.author: William Baller

reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK ON A XOOM
reviews.comment: This does not work on a xoom. Before any of you start.  I know Bluetooth devices well. And work in tech support.  I have tried to manually to config. To no avail.  So yea nice try but FAIL.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best WiiMote software
reviews.comment: I feel that this is the best solution for using a wiimote with an android device.  The only thing lacking is support for the nunchuck and the classic controller.  With that addition I would pay a reasonable amount for this app.  Thanks for your efforts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Love it! I\'m using this app on samsung admire, my maxwell tablet and of course kyocera. But wont work on my htc evo 3d.oh well
reviews.author: Isaac Rodriguez

reviews.title: It works great on gs3!
reviews.comment: Rooted my phone and everything seems to work really good :)  i dont think u even need root on the gs3 though!
reviews.author: Carlos Rivera

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I try it when my phone had 4.1 but now i cant use it because i have 4.2 i wish you could fix it it i would give a 5* if you guys make it able on 4.2
reviews.author: Edwin Corvera

reviews.title: works on Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1
reviews.comment: great app! Using a controller is much better than the touch screen.. it\'s not the easiest of setups i imagine for some people but I got it working ok after a little configuration.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs swipe mapping
reviews.comment: If you added full swipe mapping I\'d pay reasonable money for it and five star it. I want to map a classic controller for use on an MMORPG game I play on android. Works well on Galaxy S3!
reviews.author: Josh M

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: on my gs3 it moves the character on dead trigger but can\'t shoot. I\'ve tried to map buttons but can\'t do it. Can anybody help?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nes & snes
reviews.comment: The wiimote works perfectly with these emulators that I use...been playing mega man non stop and this is free! I\'m definitely contributing once I get some dough
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This was brilliant, I say was because I updated my tablet to 4.2.2 forgetting the Bluetooth issue! My classic pro controller came in the post too after waiting three weeks from ordering it and now I can\'t use it. Loved this app especially for dead trigger,  please find a fix for android 4.2 soon!
reviews.author: Leith Marshman

reviews.title: 4.2+ compatibility needed
reviews.comment: I know 4.2 android changed a lot but there is always a way around it. Even if you have to switch it to root only. Many developers have overcome 4.2 changes, don\'t get left behind. I only give 2 stars because this app actually worked in 4.1, but perhaps if this app is not compatible soon 1 star will be more appropriate.
reviews.author: Dipo Lawal
